solution_line_template: There were {total_pounds} pounds of rocks in the bucket because {total_money} / {price_per_pound} = <<{total_money}/{price_per_pound}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds}
There were {num_rocks} rocks in the bucket because {total_pounds} / {avg_weight_per_rock} = <<{num_rocks}={num_rocks}>>{num_rocks}
